title: Signatures
publication_title: Gauguin Paintings, Sculpture, and Graphic Works at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section id="figures"> fig. 1 Detail of the signature in Gauguin’s Still Life: Wood Tankard and Metal Pitcher (1880). The Art Institute of Chicago, 1999.362.

fig. 2 Detail of the signature in Gauguin’s Still Life: Wood Tankard and Metal Pitcher (1880). The Art Institute of Chicago, 1999.326.

fig. 3 Detail of the signature in Gauguin’s Arlésiennes (Mistral) (1888). The Art Institute of Chicago, 1934.391.

fig. 4 Detail of the signature in Gauguin’s Woman in front of a Still Life by Cézanne (1890). The Art Institute of Chicago, 1925.753.

fig. 5 Detail of the signature in Gauguin’s Te raau rahi (The Big Tree) (1891). The Art Institute of Chicago, 1949.513.

fig. 6 Detail of the signature in Gauguin’s Te burao (The Hibiscus Tree) (1892). The Art Institute of Chicago, 1923.308.

fig. 7 Detail of the signature in Gauguin’s Merahi metua no Tehamana (Tehamana Has Many Parents or The Ancestors of Tehamana) (1893). The Art Institute of Chicago, 1980.613.

fig. 8 Detail of the signature in Gauguin’s Mahana no atua (Day of the God) (1894). The Art Institute of Chicago, 1926.198.

fig. 9 Detail of the signature in Gauguin’s No te aha oe riri (Why Are You Angry?) (1896). The Art Institute of Chicago, 1933.1119.

fig. 10 Detail of the signature in Gauguin’s Polynesian Woman with Children (1901). The Art Institute of Chicago, 1927.460.
